text: <@U1L4RTKCM>: should we all bring our own dinner to the picnic or were you thinking more of a potluck style?
Good question!  Just to make planning easier, how about everyone bring dinner for themselves, and if people want to bring bonus sharing things that's always welcome
OR if someone else wants to coordinate people, I'd also be open to that :slightly_smiling_face:
I am happy bringing my own stuff
